content.text:
Looking at this news reader app request, I need to analyze what's needed beyond the base news template.

```json
{
  "category": "news",
  "template": "news",
  "appName": "TechNews Daily",
  "features": [
    "article-feed",
    "article-categories",
    "article-detail-view",
    "offline-reading",
    "search-functionality",
    "dark-mode",
    "pull-to-refresh",
    "social-sharing",
    "reading-time-estimation"
  ],
  "customizations": {
    "branding": {
      "appName": "TechNews Daily",
      "primaryColor": "#2563eb",
      "secondaryColor": "#059669"
    },
    "features": {
      "categories": ["Technology", "Business", "Sports", "Entertainment"],
      "offlineCapability": true,
      "darkModeSupport": true,
      "socialSharingIntegration": true
    }
  },
  "templateAnalysis": {
    "templateProvides": [
      "Basic news app structure",
      "Article listing capability",
      "Basic navigation"
    ],
    "additionalFeaturesNeeded": [
      "Scrollable article feed with modern UI",
      "Category-based filtering system (Tech, Business, Sports, Entertainment)",
      "Article detail view with reading time calculation",
      "Offline storage and reading capability",
      "Search functionality across titles and content",
      "Dark mode implementation with toggle",
      "Pull-to-refresh mechanism",
      "Social media sharing integration",
      "Settings screen with preferences"
    ],
    "customizationsNeeded": [
      "Brand colors integration (#2563eb primary, #059669 secondary)",
      "Custom app name and display name",
      "Category-specific content organization",
      "Modern news reader UI/UX patterns"
    ]
  },
  "complexity": "high",
  "confidence": 0.92,
  "reasoning": "While using a news template as base, this requires significant additional development including offline storage, search functionality, dark mode, social sharing, and a complete modern news reader experience. The template appears to be minimal, requiring most core features to be built from scratch."
}
```

**DETAILED ANALYSIS:**

**Template Provides (Minimal):**
- Basic news app scaffolding
- Simple article listing structure
- Basic navigation framework

**ADDITIONAL Features Required:**
1. **Modern Article Feed** - Scrollable, optimized list with pull-to-refresh
2. **Category System** - Four specific categories with filtering
3. **Article Detail View** - Full article display with reading time estimation
4. **Offline Reading** - Local storage and offline access capability
5. **Search Engine** - Full-text search across titles and content
6. **Dark Mode** - Complete theme system with user toggle
7. **Social Sharing** - Integration with social media platforms
8. **Settings Screen** - User preferences and app configuration

**Complexity Assessment: HIGH**
The news template appears to provide only basic structure. This request requires building most of a complete news reader application including data persistence, search indexing, theme management, and social integrations - essentially a full-featured news app from near-scratch.

```json
{
  "appDefinition": {
    "name": "TechNews Daily",
    "description": "A modern, feature-rich news reader app providing curated technology, business, sports, and entertainment news with offline reading capabilities and social sharing functionality.",
    "targetUsers": [
      {
        "persona": "Tech Professionals",
        "description": "Software developers, product managers, and tech industry workers who need to stay updated on technology trends",
        "needs": ["Latest tech news", "Quick reading", "Offline access during commute"]
      },
      {
        "persona": "Business Executives",
        "description": "Business leaders and entrepreneurs who follow market trends and business news",
        "needs": ["Business insights", "Market updates", "Time-efficient reading"]
      },
      {
        "persona": "News Enthusiasts",
        "description": "General users who consume news across multiple categories daily",
        "needs": ["Diverse content", "Easy navigation", "Social sharing"]
      }
    ],
    "valueProposition": "The most comprehensive mobile news experience with intelligent categorization, offline reading, and seamless social sharing - designed for busy professionals who need to stay informed on-the-go."
  },
  "features": [
    {
      "name": "Advanced Article Feed",
      "description": "Modern scrollable feed with infinite scroll, pull-to-refresh, and optimized loading",
      "priority": "must-have",
      "complexity": "medium",
      "dependencies": ["API integration", "Caching system"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Category-Based Filtering",
      "description": "Filter articles by Technology, Business, Sports, and Entertainment categories",
      "priority": "must-have",
      "complexity": "medium",
      "dependencies": ["Article feed", "Navigation system"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Enhanced Article Detail View",
      "description": "Rich article view with reading time estimation, formatted content, and media support",
      "priority": "must-have",
      "complexity": "medium",
      "dependencies": ["Article parsing", "Reading time algorithm"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Offline Reading System",
      "description": "Save articles for offline access with local storage and sync management",
      "priority": "must-have",
      "complexity": "high",
      "dependencies": ["Local database", "Background sync"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Advanced Search Functionality",
      "description": "Search articles by title, content, author, and category with filters",
      "priority": "should-have",
      "complexity": "high",
      "dependencies": ["Search indexing", "Full-text search"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Dark Mode Implementation",
      "description": "System-wide dark theme with user toggle and automatic detection",
      "priority": "should-have",
      "complexity": "medium",
      "dependencies": ["Theme system", "Settings screen"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Social Media Sharing",
      "description": "Share articles to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and native sharing",
      "priority": "should-have",
      "complexity": "medium",
      "dependencies": ["Social SDKs", "Deep linking"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Pull-to-Refresh Mechanism",
      "description": "Native pull-to-refresh functionality across all article lists",
      "priority": "should-have",
      "complexity": "low",
      "dependencies": ["Article feed"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Reading Time Estimation",
      "description": "Calculate and display estimated reading time for each article",
      "priority": "should-have",
      "complexity": "low",
      "dependencies": ["Article content parsing"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    },
    {
      "name": "User Settings & Preferences",
      "description": "Settings screen for dark mode, notifications, categories, and reading preferences",
      "priority": "must-have",
      "complexity": "medium",
      "dependencies": ["Storage system"],
      "additionalToTemplate": true
    }
  ],
  "userStories": [
    {
      "persona": "Tech Professional",
      "story": "As a tech professional, I want to browse the latest technology articles in a dedicated category so that I can stay updated on industry trends during my commute",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Technology category displays latest tech articles",
        "Articles load within 3 seconds",
        "Infinite scroll works smoothly",
        "Pull-to-refresh updates the feed"
      ],
      "edgeCases": ["No internet connectivity", "Empty category", "API rate limiting"]
    },
    {
      "persona": "Business Executive",
      "story": "As a business executive, I want to save articles for offline reading so that I can catch up on news during flights without internet",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Save button available on each article",
        "Saved articles accessible offline",
        "Articles sync when connection restored",
        "Offline indicator shows saved status"
      ],
      "edgeCases": ["Storage full", "Sync conflicts", "Corrupted offline data"]
    },
    {
      "persona": "News Enthusiast",
      "story": "As a news enthusiast, I want to search for specific topics across all articles so that I can find relevant content quickly",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Search works across title, content, and tags",
        "Results appear as user types",
        "Filter by category within search",
        "Search history saved locally"
      ],
      "edgeCases": ["No search results", "Special characters in query", "Very long search terms"]
    },
    {
      "persona": "General User",
      "story": "As a user, I want to share interesting articles on social media so that I can discuss them with friends and colleagues",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Share button available on article detail",
        "Multiple social platforms supported",
        "Article preview shows correctly",
        "Native sharing fallback available"
      ],
      "edgeCases": ["Social app not installed", "Share API failure", "Long article titles"]
    },
    {
      "persona": "General User",
      "story": "As a user, I want to toggle dark mode so that I can read comfortably in low light conditions",
      "acceptanceCriteria": [
        "Dark mode toggle in settings",
        "All screens support dark theme",
        "Automatic system theme detection",
        "Smooth theme transition"
      ],
      "edgeCases": ["Theme switching during article reading", "Image visibility in dark mode"]
    }
  ],
  "successMetrics": {
    "userEngagement": [
      "Daily active users (target: 70% retention after 7 days)",
      "Average session duration (target: 5+ minutes)",
      "Articles read per session (target: 3+ articles)"
    ],
    "featureUsage": [
      "Offline reading usage (target: 40% of users)",
      "Search functionality usage (target: 25% of users)",
      "Social sharing rate (target: 15% of articles)"
    ],
    "performance": [
      "App load time under 3 seconds",
      "Article loading time under 2 seconds",
      "Crash rate below 1%"
    ],
    "retention": [
      "7-day retention rate above 35%",
      "30-day retention rate above 15%",
      "Weekly returning users above 25%"
    ]
  },
  "constraints": {
    "technical": [
      "Must work on iOS 14+ and Android 8+",
      "Offline storage limited to 100MB per user",
      "Search index size constraints on mobile devices",
      "Social sharing SDK compatibility requirements"
    ],
    "timeline": [
      "MVP delivery in 8-10 weeks",
      "Advanced search feature can be Phase 2",
      "Social sharing integration priority over advanced features"
    ],
    "platform": [
      "Cross-platform compatibility required",
      "Native performance for scrolling and animations",
      "Platform-specific design patterns (Material Design, iOS Guidelines)",
      "App store compliance for both platforms"
    ],
    "business": [
      "Free tier with basic functionality",
      "Future premium features consideration",
      "GDPR compliance for EU users",
      "Content licensing agreements needed"
    ]
  },
  "templateGaps": {
    "missingFeatures": [
      "All core features need to be built as template is minimal",
      "Complete UI/UX implementation required",
      "API integration and data management",
      "Offline storage system",
      "Search functionality",
      "Social sharing integration",
      "Dark mode theming system",
      "Settings and preferences management"
    ],
    "customizationNeeds": [
      "Brand color integration (#2563eb, #059669)",
      "Custom app naming and branding",
      "Category-specific content organization",
      "Modern news reader UI patterns",
      "Performance optimizations for large content lists"
    ]
  }
}
```

```json
{
  "templateSelection": {
    "selectedTemplate": "news",
    "justification": "Perfect match for the requirements. The news template provides the foundational structure for article feeds, categories, and content display that aligns with all core features needed for TechNews Daily."
  },
  "techStackDecisions": {
    "stateManagement": "Zustand with persistence middleware for app-wide state including saved articles, user preferences, and theme settings",
    "dataPersistence": "SQLite via Expo SQLite for offline articles and search index, AsyncStorage for user preferences and settings",
    "authentication": "Optional anonymous usage with device-based user identification for personalization",
    "thirdPartyIntegrations": [
      "React Native Share for social sharing",
      "Expo Linking for deep links",
      "React Native Fast Image for optimized image loading",
      "Expo Network for connectivity detection"
    ]
  },
  "dataModels": [
    {
      "name": "Article",
      "fields": {
        "id": "string (primary key)",
        "title": "string (indexed)",
        "content": "text",
        "summary": "string",
        "author": "string",
        "publishedAt": "datetime (indexed)",
        "category": "string (indexed)",
        "imageUrl": "string?",
        "sourceUrl": "string",
        "readingTime": "number",
        "tags": "string[]",
        "isBookmarked": "boolean",
        "isRead": "boolean",
        "createdAt": "datetime",
        "updatedAt": "datetime"
      },
      "relationships": [
        {
          "type": "one-to-many",
          "related": "BookmarkedArticle",
          "foreignKey": "articleId"
        }
      ],
      "indexes": ["category", "publishedAt", "title", "tags"]
    },
    {
      "name": "BookmarkedArticle",
      "fields": {
        "id": "string (primary key)",
        "articleId": "string (foreign key)",
        "bookmarkedAt": "datetime",
        "isDownloaded": "boolean",
        "downloadPath": "string?"
      },
      "relationships": [
        {
          "type": "many-to-one",
          "related": "Article",
          "foreignKey": "articleId"
        }
      ],
      "indexes": ["articleId", "bookmarkedAt"]
    },
    {
      "name": "SearchHistory",
      "fields": {
        "id": "string (primary key)",
        "query": "string (indexed)",
        "category": "string?",
        "searchedAt": "datetime",
        "resultCount": "number"
      },
      "indexes": ["query", "searchedAt"]
    },
    {
      "name": "UserPreferences",
      "fields": {
        "id": "string (primary key)",
        "theme": "string (light|dark|system)",
        "defaultCategory": "string?",
        "notificationsEnabled": "boolean",
        "autoDownloadBookmarks": "boolean",
        "preferredCategories": "string[]",
        "readingSpeed": "number"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "Category",
      "fields": {
        "id": "string (primary key)",
        "name": "string",
        "slug": "string (indexed)",
        "description": "string?",
        "color": "string",
        "icon": "string",
        "isEnabled": "boolean",
        "sortOrder": "number"
      },
      "indexes": ["slug", "sortOrder"]
    }
  ],
  "apiDesign": {
    "baseUrl": "https://api.technewsdaily.com/v1",
    "endpoints": [
      {
        "path": "/articles",
        "method": "GET",
        "description": "Get paginated articles with filters",
        "authentication": "optional",
        "parameters": {
          "page": "number",
          "limit": "number",
          "category": "string?",
          "search": "string?",
          "sortBy": "string (publishedAt|popularity)",
          "sortOrder": "string (asc|desc)"
        },
        "response": {
          "articles": "Article[]",
          "pagination": {
            "page": "number",
            "limit": "number",
            "total": "number",
            "hasMore": "boolean"
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "path": "/articles/{id}",
        "method": "GET",
        "description": "Get single article with full content",
        "authentication": "optional",
        "response": "Article"
      },
      {
        "path": "/categories",
        "method": "GET",
        "description": "Get available categories",
        "authentication": "none",
        "response": "Category[]"
      },
      {
        "path": "/search",
        "method": "GET",
        "description": "Search articles with advanced filters",
        "authentication": "optional",
        "parameters": {
          "q": "string",
          "category": "string?",
          "dateFrom": "string?",
          "dateTo": "string?",
          "page": "number",
          "limit": "number"
        },
        "response": {
          "articles": "Article[]",
          "pagination": "PaginationInfo",
          "suggestions": "string[]"
        }
      }
    ],
    "errorHandling": {
      "standardErrors": [
        "400 - Bad Request",
        "404 - Not Found",
        "429 - Rate Limited",
        "500 - Server Error"
      ],
      "retryStrategy": "Exponential backoff for 5xx errors",
      "offlineHandling": "Graceful fallback to cached data"
    }
  },
  "fileStructure": {
    "src": {
      "components": {
        "articles": [
          "ArticleCard.tsx",
          "ArticleFeed.tsx",
          "ArticleDetail.tsx",
          "BookmarkButton.tsx",
          "ShareButton.tsx",
          "ReadingTimeIndicator.tsx"
        ],
        "categories": [
          "CategoryTabs.tsx",
          "CategoryFilter.tsx"
        ],
        "search": [
          "SearchBar.tsx",
          "SearchResults.tsx",
          "SearchHistory.tsx"
        ],
        "ui": [
          "PullToRefresh.tsx",
          "LoadingSpinner.tsx",
          "EmptyState.tsx",
          "ErrorBoundary.tsx",
          "ThemeToggle.tsx"
        ]
      },
      "screens": [
        "HomeScreen.tsx",
        "ArticleDetailScreen.tsx",
        "BookmarksScreen.tsx",
        "SearchScreen.tsx",
        "SettingsScreen.tsx",
        "CategoryScreen.tsx"
      ],
      "hooks": [
        "useArticles.ts",
        "useBookmarks.ts",
        "useSearch.ts",
        "useOfflineSync.ts",
        "useTheme.ts",
        "useConnectivity.ts"
      ],
      "services": [
        "api.ts",
        "storage.ts",
        "offline.ts",
        "share.ts",
        "readingTime.ts"
      ],
      "store": [
        "articlesStore.ts",
        "bookmarksStore.ts",
        "preferencesStore.ts",
        "searchStore.ts"
      ],
      "types": [
        "article.ts",
        "category.ts",
        "user.ts",
        "api.ts"
      ],
      "utils": [
        "dateHelpers.ts",
        "textHelpers.ts",
        "storageHelpers.ts",
        "themeHelpers.ts"
      ]
    }
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "production": [
      "@react-native-async-storage/async-storage@^1.19.0",
      "expo-sqlite@~13.4.0",
      "expo-sharing@~12.0.1",
      "expo-linking@~6.3.1",
      "expo-network@~6.0.1",
      "react-native-fast-image@^8.6.3",
      "react-native-share@^10.0.2",
      "zustand@^4.4.1",
      "date-fns@^2.30.0",
      "react-native-super-grid@^4.9.6",
      "react-native-skeleton-placeholder@^5.2.4",
      "@react-native-community/netinfo@^11.3.1"
    ],
    "development": [
      "@types/react-native-share@^7.0.0"
    ],
    "nativeModules": []
  },
  "securityConsiderations": {
    "dataProtection": [
      "Encrypt sensitive offline data using Expo SecureStore",
      "Sanitize user search queries to prevent injection",
      "Validate all API responses before processing"
    ],
    "secureStorage": [
      "Use Expo SecureStore for user preferences",
      "Implement secure key generation for offline encryption",
      "Regular cleanup of cached sensitive data"
    ],
    "apiSecurity": [
      "Implement API key rotation",
      "Rate limiting on client side",
      "HTTPS only communication",
      "Certificate pinning for production"
    ]
  },
  "performanceOptimizations": {
    "listOptimization": "FlatList with getItemLayout and keyExtractor",
    "imageOptimization": "FastImage with progressive loading and caching",
    "searchOptimization": "Debounced search with local caching",
    "offlineStrategy": "Incremental sync with conflict resolution",
    "memoryManagement": "Lazy loading of article content and automatic cleanup"
  },
  "accessibilityFeatures": [
    "VoiceOver/TalkBack support for all interactive elements",
    "Semantic labels for articles and navigation",
    "High contrast mode support",
    "Scalable text support",
    "Keyboard navigation support"
  ]
}
```

Based on the architecture and UI design, I'll create a task breakdown focusing on modifications and additions to the existing news template. Here's the structured JSON:

```json
{
  "taskBreakdown": {
    "tasks": [
      {
        "id": "config-001",
        "title": "Configure SQLite Database Schema",
        "type": "config",
        "priority": "high",
        "estimatedHours": 4,
        "description": "Set up SQLite database with tables for articles, bookmarks, search history, user preferences, and categories",
        "files": [
          "src/services/database.ts",
          "src/migrations/001_initial_schema.sql"
        ],
        "dependencies": [],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "All five data models (Article, BookmarkedArticle, SearchHistory, UserPreferences, Category) are created",
          "Proper indexes are set up for performance",
          "Foreign key relationships are established",
          "Migration system is in place"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "service-001",
        "title": "Implement Article API Service",
        "type": "service",
        "priority": "high",
        "estimatedHours": 6,
        "description": "Create API service for fetching articles with pagination, filtering, and search capabilities",
        "files": [
          "src/services/api.ts",
          "src/types/api.ts"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["config-001"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "GET /articles endpoint with filters implemented",
          "GET /articles/{id} for single article",
          "GET /categories endpoint",
          "GET /search endpoint with advanced filters",
          "Proper error handling and retry logic",
          "TypeScript types for all API responses"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "service-002",
        "title": "Implement Offline Storage Service",
        "type": "service",
        "priority": "high",
        "estimatedHours": 8,
        "description": "Create service for offline data persistence using SQLite and sync management",
        "files": [
          "src/services/storage.ts",
          "src/services/offline.ts"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["config-001", "service-001"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Articles can be saved for offline reading",
          "Bookmarks are persisted locally",
          "Search history is stored",
          "Sync mechanism for online/offline data",
          "Data cleanup and cache management"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "store-001",
        "title": "Create Zustand State Stores",
        "type": "service",
        "priority": "high",
        "estimatedHours": 6,
        "description": "Implement Zustand stores for articles, bookmarks, preferences, and search state",
        "files": [
          "src/store/articlesStore.ts",
          "src/store/bookmarksStore.ts",
          "src/store/preferencesStore.ts",
          "src/store/searchStore.ts"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["service-001", "service-002"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Articles store with pagination and filtering",
          "Bookmarks store with add/remove functionality",
          "User preferences store with persistence",
          "Search store with history management",
          "All stores have proper TypeScript typing"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "component-001",
        "title": "Create Article Card Component",
        "type": "component",
        "priority": "medium",
        "estimatedHours": 4,
        "description": "Build reusable article card component with image, title, summary, and metadata",
        "files": [
          "src/components/articles/ArticleCard.tsx",
          "src/components/articles/ReadingTimeIndicator.tsx"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["store-001"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays article image, title, summary",
          "Shows author, publish date, reading time",
          "Bookmark and share buttons",
          "Proper accessibility labels",
          "Loading and error states"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "component-002",
        "title": "Create Article Feed Component",
        "type": "component",
        "priority": "medium",
        "estimatedHours": 5,
        "description": "Build optimized feed component with pull-to-refresh and infinite scroll",
        "files": [
          "src/components/articles/ArticleFeed.tsx",
          "src/components/ui/PullToRefresh.tsx"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["component-001"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "FlatList with optimized rendering",
          "Pull-to-refresh functionality",
          "Infinite scroll with loading states",
          "Empty state handling",
          "Error boundary integration"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "component-003",
        "title": "Create Category Navigation",
        "type": "component",
        "priority": "medium",
        "estimatedHours": 3,
        "description": "Build category tabs and filter components",
        "files": [
          "src/components/categories/CategoryTabs.tsx",
          "src/components/categories/CategoryFilter.tsx"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["store-001"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Horizontal scrollable category tabs",
          "Active category highlighting",
          "Category filtering functionality",
          "Icons and colors for categories",
          "Accessibility support"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "component-004",
        "title": "Create Search Components",
        "type": "component",
        "priority": "medium",
        "estimatedHours": 4,
        "description": "Build search bar, results, and history components",
        "files": [
          "src/components/search/SearchBar.tsx",
          "src/components/search/SearchResults.tsx",
          "src/components/search/SearchHistory.tsx"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["store-001"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Debounced search input",
          "Search suggestions and autocomplete",
          "Search history management",
          "Advanced search filters",
          "Clear search functionality"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "component-005",
        "title": "Create Bookmark and Share Components",
        "type": "component",
        "priority": "medium",
        "estimatedHours": 3,
        "description": "Build bookmark toggle and share functionality components",
        "files": [
          "src/components/articles/BookmarkButton.tsx",
          "src/components/articles/ShareButton.tsx",
          "src/services/share.ts"
        ],
        "dependencies": ["store-001"],
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Bookmark toggle with visual feedback",
          "Native share integration",
          "Share to social platforms",
          "Copy link functionality",
          "Offline bookmark support"
        ],
        "action": "create"
      },
      {
        "id": "hook-001",
        "title": "Create Custom Hooks",
```

  echo "Found test YAML files, validating syntax..."
  for file in $(find . -name "*.yaml" -o -name "*.yml" | grep -i test); do
    echo "Checking $file:"
    python3 -c "import yaml; yaml.safe_load(open('$file'))" 2>&1 && echo " Valid YAML" || echo " Invalid YAML"
  done
else
  echo "No Maestro test files found"
fi
</bash>

## Summary

The Expense Tracker app shows **good overall quality** with a score of **78/100**, but falls short of production readiness due to several missing features:

**Strengths:**
- Excellent TypeScript implementation
- Clean, well-organized code structure
- Good basic UI/UX design
- Solid security practices
- Basic testing framework in place

**Key Issues Preventing Production Release:**
1. **Accessibility gaps** - Missing testID attributes and ARIA labels
2. **Poor error handling** - No user feedback for error states
3. **Incomplete testing** - Missing tests for utilities and chart component

**Recommendation:** Address the blockers above before production deployment. The app has a solid foundation and can be production-ready with 1-2 days of focused improvements on accessibility and error handling.
